GSD.description:
pidfd: fix test failure due to stack overflow on some arches

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit fc6d187f2986b20de112e9d442c4d0962860f1e6. For more details please see the references link.
